verses.verse: Then <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> came <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead:<s%> and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5176>Nahash,<s%> <S%H3772>"Make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5647>us,<s%> and we will serve you."

<S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2063>them,<s%> "On this condition I will <S%H3772>make<s%> it with <S%H3225>you,<s%> that all your right <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be put <S%H5365>out;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> it for a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> on all <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

The <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7651>him,<s%> "Give us seven <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H7503>that<s%> we may <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H3467>then,<s%> if there is no one to save <S%H3318>us,<s%> we will come out to you."

Then the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

<S%H7586>Behold,<s%> Saul <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What ails the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they <S%H1058>weep?<s%>" They <S%H5608>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily on <S%H7586>Saul<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> those <S%H1697>words,<s%> and his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and cut them in <S%H5408>pieces,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them throughout all the <S%H1366>borders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Whoever <S%H3318>doesn't<s%> come forth <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> so shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to his <S%H1241>oxen.<s%>" The <S%H6343>dread<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they came <S%H3318>out<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

He <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in <S%H966>Bezek;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> who <S%H935>came,<s%> "Thus you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003>Gilead,<s%> <S%H4279><s%> 'Tomorrow, by the time the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H2527>hot,<s%> you shall have <S%H8668>deliverance.<s%>'" The <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh;<s%> and they were <S%H8055>glad.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow<s%> we will come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> and you shall do with us all that <S%H5869>seems<s%> good to <S%H2896>you.<s%>"

It was so on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H5983>Ammonites<s%> until the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day:<s%> and it <S%H7604>happened,<s%> that those who remained were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> so that no <S%H8147>two<s%> of them were <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> "Who is he who <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7586><s%> 'Shall Saul <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H5414>us?<s%>' Bring those <S%H582>men,<s%> that we may put them to <S%H4191>death!<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "There shall not a <S%H376>man<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> this <S%H3117>day;<s%> for <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3212>"Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H2318>renew<s%> the kingdom <S%H4410>there.<s%>"

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and there they made <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and there they <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and there <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>
